query: UPDATE releases SET is_latest = 0 WHERE is_latest = 1; INSERT INTO releases (version, title, notes, file_size_mb, is_latest, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ('v5.0.0', 'Developer API & Email Auth', '**Archibald Titan v5.0.0 — Developer API Release**; **New Features:**; - Developer REST API with documented endpoints and code examples (cURL, Python, Node.js); - API Key management — generate, rotate, and revoke keys from the dashboard; - Webhook management — subscribe to credential, scan, and vault events with delivery logs; - API Analytics — real-time usage tracking, rate limit monitoring, and endpoint breakdown; - SDK download section for developers to integrate Titan into their programs; - Email/Password authentication — anyone can sign up and log in without Manus OAuth; - Titan Assistant upgraded — fully unrestricted general-purpose AI with 4096 token responses; - Strict paywall enforcement — all advanced features gated behind paid plans; **Improvements:**; - Updated quick actions in Titan Assistant (API Integration, Write Code, Ask Anything); - Improved system prompt with v5.0 feature knowledge; - 404 total tests passing', 142.5, 1, NOW(), NOW());
